summary: Several years after the events from the first movie, an evil mercenary group and a team of researchers they've taken hostage return to the haunted asylum in search of a precious statue, a satanic idol believed to possess demonic powers.
cast: Amanda Righetti|Cerina Vincent|Erik Palladino|Tom Riley|Andrew Lee Potts|Jeffrey Combs|Steven Pacey|Calita Rainford|Gil Kolirin|Andrew Pleavin|Charles Venn|Tatina de Marinis|George Zlatarev|Stilyana Mitkova|Laia Colàs|Oksana Borbat|Xeniya Fesenko|Miroslav Petrov|Emil Markov|Deian Dinev|Tanya Kozhuharova|Maria Georgieva|Emil Tonev|Nikolai Iliev|Zhasmina Toskova|Jasmina Jekova|Iva Atanasova|Tanya Nedeleva|Hristo Parvanov|Nikolai Chobanov|Bill R. Dean
keywords: psychotronic film|man torn to pieces|evil lesbian|female mercenary|haunted asylum
title: Return to House on Haunted Hill
